postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Hello all 
 
I am looking for a good looking and open minded girl to be my date for a wedding i have to attend in Melbourne in January. The trip is all expenses paid for including accommodation at hotels and a trip to Sydney and Gold Coast after the wedding. It also includes all ticket prices paid for any activities in Gold Coast. 
 
I am single and recently broken up and need to blow off some steam. I do not want to attend this wedding alone and am looking for a fun, open minded companion for my travels. The trip is from 14th Jan for 16 days. 
 
Please feel free to contact me or drop me an email with a photo of yourself and some details included. I would love to meet you so we can get to know each other better before the flight to Australia. 
 
Thank you for your time.
title: travel buddy all expenses paid

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
This is a 6 month rolling contract with a singapore based start up in the e-commerce world. 
 
About you 
You are a driven, self motivated, energetic and curious and entrepreneurial young professional. You need to be a star in generating/creating content, researching, editing videos, editing images and managing multiple priorities. Your sole game is content creation for social media and marketing coordination - you will likely have some training in graphic design or video editing. Thats it. You will be a one man/woman team supported by two cofounders who are hands on. Most likely will work out of a co-working space or remotely as needed. There will be 1-2 days a month when weekend work is required but we are super flexible with regards to time off and working arrangements. We don't care what qualifications you have or dont have...  as long as you understand the above - we will test your knowledge during interview but most of all we want to see your energy and attitude. 
 
Requirements:  
* Adobe Photoshop/Indesign/Premier skills get you to the top of the list 
* Strong layout skills with a strong foundation of design fundamentals and colour theory. 
* Excellent English language written communication skills 
* up-to-date with new media; digital and social media savvy 
* Self-motivated, target driven, and able to work independently 
* Strong team player with a focus on productivity and deadlines 
* A perfectionist with an eye for detail down to the last pixel. 
* We like designers who ask questions and strive for quick, continuous learning. 
* Good attitude and personality. 
* able to think of the box 
 
About us 
We are two co-founders running two e-commerce businesses and super excited about the prospect of bringing in someone on-board. The business is in the personal care business (skincare, hair, baby-care, etc) we are focused on promoting high quality products that are safe, ethical and eco in nature. The industry we are in is worth over 400 Billion annually and its experiencing disruption through a change in people's mindset and values.  
 
What's in it for you:  
- An opportunity 
- 1.8K per month 
- Quarterly bonus tied to KPI's 
- Experience & exposure: you get be part of a brand new start up and see how the business is built ground up. You will take part in strategy, tactics, interviews with industry practitioners & business founders, etc 
 
1/2 yearly revisions of salary tied to your performance and impact to bottom line.
title: Digital Content & Marketing Hustler

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
- Responsible for the company's marketing efforts from end to end, from development, idea generation, marketing strategy, execution and implementation 
- Increase the company's awareness online and, ultimately drive sales and increase market share both online and offline 
- Develop, co-ordinate and deliver outstanding digital communications across platforms (social media, website, partners etc.) 
- Create content resources to drive leads, subscribers and awareness 
- Optimize marketing automation tools (from CMS) and lead nurturing processes through email, content, and social channels 
- Generate ideas and create tactical promotions and campaigns with the key objective of generating leads 
 
JOB REQUIREMENTS: 
 
- Diploma / Degree in Marketing / Business Management or equivalent 
- At least 1 to 2 years' experience in executing marketing campaigns and strategies 
- Competent in website and marketing material content creation and management 
- A self-motivated individual who is able to work in a fast paced environment 
- Possess excellent verbal and written communication skills 
- Able to prioritise and manage multiple and competing demands in a timely and professional manner 
  
Interested applicants kindly submit your resume in Microsoft Word document to 
  show contact info 
. Alternatively, you may fax your resume to us at 3151-8308. 
 
Please include in your resume the following information: 
 
(1) Reason(s) for leaving your current and/or previous employment(s) 
(2) Availability / Notice period required 
(3) Current / Last drawn and expected salary 
(4) Recent photograph 
(5) Names and contact numbers of 2 character referees relating to your previous employment(s) 
 
We thank you in advance for your interest in applying for this position and shall get in touch with you as soon as you have been shortlisted. 
  
EA Registration No: R1103530 
EA Licence No: 05C3767

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Company Overview 
Ascenshoppe is committed to bringing to the market a portfolio of the highest quality health and beauty solutions that improve one's quality of life and extend the healthy life expectancy. We introduce essential beauty and wellness products from Japan, New Zealand and USA that align and satisfy consumers' every-growing desires and needs. Check us out at www.ascenshoppe.com.sg ! 
 
Job Scope / Responsibilities: 
You will work closely with the Marketing team supporting clients with content development and marketing ideas for social and online platforms. 
Ascen Resource values our interns for their strong design sensibility and promotes their professional development during the term. You will have the opportunity to learn to meet daily, weekly and long-term deadlines in a fast-paced environment; therefore the ability to take creative directions and work independently is a must. 
 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 
Ensure the correct corporate policy and brand standards are followed for all printed and displayed materials 
Assist in managing Ecommerce and Facebook respond to queries 
Coordinate marketing POP deliveries 
Merchandizing of stores and first hand marketing research 
Reporting of market findings 
Implement new initiatives for the merchant team to automate processes and speed up the current flow. 
Work with networks and merchants to ensure accurate information is being captured 
 
TALENT PROFILE: 
Open to students who are seeking for internships/work attachment 
Equipped with skills in the use of PowerPoint, Word and Excel 
 
HOW TO APPLY: Please write in with your detailed resume and email us at 
  show contact info
title: Looking for Marketing Intern! (Minimum 3 months)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Responsibilities  
 
Your job will be to be a Interviewer (Field Work / Internet Growth Hacker) for CusJo - The Smarter Survey Analytics Company for StartUps, Professionals and Enterprises.  
 
You will be expected to identify respondents on behalf of our clients and get accurate and comprehensive responses for our clients to get the volume, variety and veracity of intelligence they require to assist them as part of their customer journey, market research and talent optimation analytics needs.  
 
This will require you to identify potential respondents and interact with them in a multitude of ways from face-to-face dialogue or using digital channels.  
 
If you perform your job well to the level of excellence we require, you will be invited to do more projects with us around the world as well as be given an opportunity to build your own team of Market Research Interviewers. 
 
If you get past the interview stage you will also be provided with a comprehensive onboarding program  in which you will be brought up to speed on the principles of audience dialogues, respondent selection as well as on how to validate the quality of responses collated by your team if you are in a leadership position.  
 
Apply here to arrange for a faster interview. https://cusjo.cusjo.com/interview 
 
 
Requirements 
 
You are expected to get out into the world, interact with a large number of people and: 
 
1) Have great commuication skills, be highly energetic and not let poor experiences get you down.  
 
2) Be highly personable - warmly, welcoming, friendly, approachable and have a genuine curiosity about people.  
 
3) Be highly professional - build domain knowledge in the field of intelligence gathering and have the competency to comprehend and answer the audiences questions and queries accurately and with sentivity.  
 
Apply here to arrange for a faster interview. https://cusjo.cusjo.com/interview
title: Market Research Interviewers (> SGD 200 per day)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
This business has the potential to not only increase your income, but change your life!  
 
If you believe that there must be a better way to generate a significant income and create the life you desire, we would love to connect with you.  
 
This is not an MLM, pyramid or get-rich-quick scheme. You will never cold call, solicit, spam or reach out to your family and friends. You do not need to know how to "sell". You can work where, when and how you want. But you will have to work. This is about you, building your (global)  business. 
 
You do need to be willing to invest in yourself, your business and your professional growth. You need to show up with a business mindset - as an entrepreneur and not as an employee.  
 
This is an opportunity for you to change your life, and we are here to show you how.  
 
Please respond with a valid phone number or visit moretimetogive.com/opportunity/ to connect.  
 
You will hear back from us personally within 48 hours. Catherine and Dave.
title: Opportunity is Knocking
